pageContext.claim: “Russian collusion. you know? I guarantee you. I am tougher on Russia, nobody ever thought -- have you heard about the lawyer? A woman lawyer, she said, I know nothing. Now she supposedly -- you know why? Putin and the group said, Trump is killing us. Why don't you say you are involved with government so that we can go and make their life in United States even more chaotic?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump again claims without evidence that he has been tougher than any president on Russia. Here, he adds the oddity of suggesting that Natalia Veselnitskaya, the Russian lawyer who met with Donald Trump Jr. and other campaign aides -- an action criticized by the House Intelligence Committee report -- is actually working at the behest of Russian President Vladimir Putin. That would make the circumstances of the meeting even worse.
